metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\fs24{\fs48\b Geraint's JSFX repository\b}\line\line This is a collection of audio effects I have written in REAPER's JSFX language.\line\line Download them from {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://github.com/geraintluff/jsfx"}}{\fldrslt GitHub}}, or (link_ref)as a ZIP file(https://signalsmith-audio.co.uk/tmp/Geraint's%20JSFX.zip), or on {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://reapack.com/"}}{\fldrslt ReaPack}} by adding the repository: https://geraintluff.github.io/jsfx/index.xml\line\line There's also a growing set of {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLflIiXZOocKqgKexrkTxxtl6igGUWnpXK"}}{\fldrslt video demos/tutorials}}, although not all effects are covered (yet).\line\line }

{\rtf1\ansi\fs24Links: {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://geraintluff.github.io/jsfx/audio-demos/padsynth-takeoff.mp3"}}{\fldrslt audio demo}} / {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://geraintluff.github.io/jsfx/audio-demos/padsynth.mp3"}}{\fldrslt audio demo}} / {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgSqq-SgSjs&list=PLflIiXZOocKqgKexrkTxxtl6igGUWnpXK"}}{\fldrslt YouTube}}\line\line {\fs48\b PadSynth\b}\line\line This is a synth that specialises in smooth and thick sounds, with a bank of effects and assignable modulators that are calculated per-note. ({\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://geraintluff.github.io/jsfx/audio-demos/padsynth.mp3"}}{\fldrslt audio demo}}, {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://soundcloud.com/geraintluff/sets/padsynth-demo-tracks-2/s-xUWj6"}}{\fldrslt additional audio demos}})\line\line You can find more information and demos for this synth on its {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://github.com/geraintluff/jsfx-pad-synth"}}{\fldrslt main project page}}.\line\line {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://geraintluff.github.io/jsfx/doc/images/PadSynth.png"}}{\fldrslt screenshot}}\line\line The per-note effects can re-ordered and renamed, and the modulators can modulate any later effect in the chain, including other modulators.\line\line {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://geraintluff.github.io/jsfx/doc/images/PadSynth2.png"}}{\fldrslt screenshot}}\line\line }
